Reviews.Title: Decent camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Scarrz
Reviews.Content: The camera is cheap and the picture quality is decent for daytime but lowlight its very poor.  I know you can't expect much for this price.  It is a decent covert camera although I would have asked they not put a screw at the bottom of the unit so its seen anytime this is placed higher than eye level which most if not all the time it would be.  The silver screw stands out and very much cheapens the unit.  Easy to install and yes this has to be hard wired.

Reviews.Title: Pinhole Camera
Reviews.Author: jim
Reviews.Content: This type camera is outstanding. I bought one to overlook areas that are around 75 to 100 feet away. Where distances greater then 50 feet need to be watched over, these cameras are an excellent option to add to your security system to do just that. And the camera video is clear. You can't beat it at this price.

Reviews.Title: Just a camera, need to be connected to the recorder.
Reviews.Author: L Trieu
Reviews.Content: be careful that this is only a camera to connect to the recorder box if you have one.  I bought this expect to use it solo and have it record on the SD card, but is not.

Reviews.Title: Arrived DOA.
Reviews.Author: Vikter
Reviews.Content: Camera arrived quickly, professionally packed and it looks good. Unfortunately I received a unit that was dead on arrival and it only showed a black image on the monitor. Needless to say I was very disappointed as I was hoping to install it along with other model cameras that I also got from Amazon.Luckily, Amazon sent UPS to my door with a prepaid return label and refunded the purchase. I'm very happy with Amazon for making the return of defective goods hassle-free. Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Nice Product
Reviews.Author: Kirk G.
Reviews.Content: Functioned very well and was easy to install image quality is ok as its only a 480tvl but clear enough to know what is going on in your room. At once wires are hidden properly it is very hard for anyone to know that its a camera

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Barry Alan Porterfield
Reviews.Content: works great, much wider viewing angle than I expected. That was a very welcoming sight when I hooked it up. I was worried about getting whole room coverage, but this model did great.

Reviews.Title: Odd little camera that works OK
Reviews.Author: Woodlandsman "Woodlandsman"
Reviews.Content: Plug it in and hold the working unit in your hand and test where it works best in the room before you install it; one size will not fit every application... But, it worked fine for me covering a 10 x 12 waiting room. Functions as well as any LOW-cost NOT-hidden camera would, without being so obviously invasive. Color, in well-lit interiors, is fine. Sharpness is good enough for just watching a space for people or animals, but obviously not laser sharp. No night vision; leave a light on. Mount can be taken apart for installing the base first, then add the camera back. Very "plastic" unit, not heavy duty. Easy does it, just fine.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat for the price.
Reviews.Author: Carlos Dillard
Reviews.Content: Purchased one of these to install with my security camera system and was instantly impress. I looks exactly like several of the other motion detectors already in my home. Set up was easy, clarity was good. Only fault is there is no night vision and though being that it's rated for 1 lux you can still somewhat see what's going on in low light conditions. My neighbor was so impress he asked me to purchase him one, he'd paid a company over $150 for a similar product that did not have the same clarity as this budget camera.Maybe I need to go into the security business!Bottom line, GREAT camera for the price but NO night vision.
